import.description: Imports entire module statement in ES6 syntax

importNoModuleName.description: Imports entire module in ES6 syntax without module name

importDestructing.description: Imports only a portion of the module in ES6 syntax

importEverything.description: Imports everything as alias from the module in ES6 syntax

importAs.description: Imports a specific portion of the module by assigning a local alias in ES6 syntax

moduleExports.description: Module exports from Common JS, node syntax at ES6

exportNamedVariable.description: Export named variable in ES6 syntax

exportNamedFunction.description: Export named function in ES6 syntax

exportDefaultFunction.description: Export default function in ES6 syntax

exportClass.description: Export default class in ES6 syntax

exportClassExtends.description: Export default class which extends a base one in ES6 syntax

constructor.description: Add default constructor in a class in ES6 syntax

method.description: Creates a method inside a class in ES6 syntax

propertyGet.description: Creates a getter property inside a class in ES6 syntax

propertyset.description: Creates a setter property inside a class in ES6 syntax

forEach.description: Creates a forEach statement in ES6 syntax

forOf.description: Iterating over property names of iterable objects

forIn.description: Iterating over property values of iterable objects

anonymousFunction.description: Creates an anonymous function in ES6 syntax

namedFunction.description: Creates a named function in ES6 syntax

destructingObject.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using object destructing

destructingArray.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using array destructing

setInterval.description: Executes the given function at specified intervals in ES6 syntax

setTimeOut.description: Executes the given function after the specified delay in ES6 syntax

promise.description: Creates and returns a new Promise in the standard ES6 syntax

thenCatch.description: Add the .then and .catch methods to handle promises

consoleAssert.description: If the specified expression is false, the message is written to the console along with a stack trace

consoleCount.description: Writes the the number of times that count() has been invoked at the same line and with the same label

consoleDebug.description: Displays a message in the console. Also display a blue right arrow icon along with the logged message in Safari

consoleDir.description: Prints a JavaScript representation of the specified object

consoleError.description: Displays a message in the console and also includes a stack trace from where the method was called

consoleGroup.description: Groups and indents all following output by an additional level, until console.groupEnd() is called.

consoleLog.description: Displays a message in the console

consoleLogObject.description: Displays an object in the console with its name

consoleTrace.description: Prints a stack trace from the point where the method was called

consoleWarn.description: Displays a message in the console but also displays a yellow warning icon along with the logged message

consoleInfo.description: Displays a message in the console but also displays a blue information icon along with the logged message

consoleTable.description: Displays tabular data as a table.

consoleTime.description: Sets starting point for execution time measurement

consoleTimeEnd.description: Sets end point for execution time measurement
